oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Agri-environmental and rural development indicators: a proposal
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Yli-Viikari, Anja
Risku-Norja, Helmi
Nuutinen, Visa
Heinonen, Esa
Hietala-Koivu, Reija
Huusela-Veistola, Erja
Hyvönen, Terho
Kantanen, Juha
Raussi, Satu
Rikkonen, Pasi
Seppälä, Anu
Vehmasto, Elina
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Environmental aspects
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The present work is a proposal of a set of indicators prepared for the Ministry of Agriculture and Forestry. The indicators are to be used in monitoring the implementation of the Ministry's strategy for sustainable use of natural resources. The core of the present work is in setting up an indicator system, which is structured around specific themes. The focus is on the assessment of agricultural and rural development. At the end, an attempt is made to provide a comprehensive picture by considering the mutual inter-linkages between the various indicators.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Yli-Viikari, Anja; Risku-Norja, Helmi; Nuutinen, Visa; Heinonen, Esa; Hietala-Koivu, Reija; Huusela-Veistola, Erja; Hyvönen, Terho; Kantanen, Juha; Raussi, Satu; Rikkonen, Pasi; Seppälä, Anu and Vehmasto, Elina (2002) Agri-environmental and rural development indicators: a proposal. Agrifood Research Reports, no. 5. MTT Agrifood Research Finland.
